content: There was a very brief discussion on it and without understanding the timelines of zkSync, it's still up for debate how relevant the sync committee will be up until that point. The longer we keep delaying these changes, the more irrelevant it will be once other solutions are ready imo. Anybody in the community that relies on this protocol should review the newest spec here by Etan and signal for it: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8340. This includes the light client backfill: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8341
